channel.title: Biodiversity Literacy on Personal website for Matt Aiello-Lammens
channel.description: Recent content in Biodiversity Literacy on Personal website for Matt Aiello-Lammens

item.title: QUBES BLUE FMN
item.description: This fall I participated in my second QUBES Faculty Mentoring Network, this time working along side several other educators to implement and/or develop learning modules associated with the Biodiversity Literacy in Undergraduate Education (BLUE) network. I chose to adapt an existing module to implement in my Introduction to Statistics for Life Science course, and still have intentions of creating a new module for our last week of new material coming up.
